feed.title: WatchState Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250212-7243e78
entry.content:
• 7243e78 Merge pull request #611 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
  • 79843e7 Added missing status_code for update play state fail. by ArabCoders
  • 61ad858 Mostly clean up commit to support plex external users more widely by ArabCoders
  • 6e9e8e0 Made backend:create only update specfic keys when requested. by ArabCoders
  • 95be540 Made plex.GetUser rely on GetUsersList to support external users. by ArabCoders
  • 3120b94 Remove debug statements from code. by ArabCoders
  • 20cdf3c updated servers.spec to include desc for new keys. by ArabCoders
  • 71dd9e8 Added initial support to generate accesstokens for external plex users. by ArabCoders
  • e7adc3a Made possible to be able to restore backend data using the backup page. by ArabCoders
  • fc7f4b8 Added support for sub users in state:backup command. by ArabCoders
  • ab3b788 Added support for sub users in backend:ignore:* commands. by ArabCoders
  • 0235936 Enabled sub-user support for backend:restore command by ArabCoders

What's Changed

  • Fix release title. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/577
  • re-enable dev builds by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/578
  • fix permissions by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/579
  • make build work on manual dispatch as well by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/580
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/581
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/582
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/583
  • Support per user mapper and database. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/584
  • Implement per user servers.yaml, and support mark as unplayed for all users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/585
  • Free memory after each user sync, and prevent syncing main user by default as it's covered by the regular import/export, and provide flag to enable it. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/586
  • Implements progress sync for all users via state:sync by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/587
  • Fully implemented our vision for Multi-user sync via state:sync command by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/588
  • Added new command to diff two backup files and find the difference by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/590
  • Compress backup files by default and extends lifetime of backups to 90d by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/591
  • Show zip files in backup api and remove the uncompressed file if compressing was done by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/592
  • support backing up mutli-user watch state via state:backup by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/593
  • Major sub users refactor by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/594
  • Merged state:sync functionality into state:import and state:export by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/596
  • Minor frontend improvements by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/597
  • generate changelog json files on tag by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/598
  • more changelog changes by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/599
  • more github workflow updates by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/600
  • more github action changes. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/601
  • fix changelog generator by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/602
  • more workflow changes by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/603
  • Update external packages. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/604
  • update build by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/605
  • disable reflog for CHANGELOG generation by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/606
  • Mostly minor changes on how we display changes. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/607
  • More changes to support Sub-users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/608
  • More changes to support plex external users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/611

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250118-a9fa743...master-20250212-7243e78

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250215-638a359
entry.content:
• 15bea97 updated frontend packages by ArabCoders
  • bbdc512 Forgot to turn on the prune file deletion. by ArabCoders
  • 8c955db imporved the logging process for tasks run via events to give more realtime updates by ArabCoders
  • 1d294cb added a way to clear event logs by ArabCoders
  • 7f61ac9 update task event log every 5secs by ArabCoders
  • 2378125 minor changes to processes.vue display. by ArabCoders
  • 321379b Added new endpoint to show running processes. by ArabCoders
  • 2445c1e fixed failing tests by ArabCoders
  • d116dea log message if the task command is stuck by ArabCoders
  • 4d4ff09 finish updating backends log messages to account for sub-users by ArabCoders
  • 94fc831 mainly log messages cleanup by ArabCoders
  • 5cdcf23 use arrayToJson instead of arrayToString for log context. by ArabCoders
  • 52bb264 make latest tag more clear by ArabCoders
  • 5aa2372 Make changelog.vue compare the tag only by ArabCoders
  • 510c54f Cleaned up and updated jellyfin/emby log messages. by ArabCoders
  • bce50ef updated external packages by ArabCoders
  • e6f5154 dont show merge commits in log by ArabCoders

What's Changed

  • Fix release title. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/577
  • re-enable dev builds by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/578
  • fix permissions by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/579
  • make build work on manual dispatch as well by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/580
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/581
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/582
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/583
  • Support per user mapper and database. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/584
  • Implement per user servers.yaml, and support mark as unplayed for all users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/585
  • Free memory after each user sync, and prevent syncing main user by default as it's covered by the regular import/export, and provide flag to enable it. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/586
  • Implements progress sync for all users via state:sync by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/587
  • Fully implemented our vision for Multi-user sync via state:sync command by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/588
  • Added new command to diff two backup files and find the difference by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/590
  • Compress backup files by default and extends lifetime of backups to 90d by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/591
  • Show zip files in backup api and remove the uncompressed file if compressing was done by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/592
  • support backing up mutli-user watch state via state:backup by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/593
  • Major sub users refactor by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/594
  • Merged state:sync functionality into state:import and state:export by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/596
  • Minor frontend improvements by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/597
  • generate changelog json files on tag by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/598
  • more changelog changes by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/599
  • more github workflow updates by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/600
  • more github action changes. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/601
  • fix changelog generator by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/602
  • more workflow changes by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/603
  • Update external packages. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/604
  • update build by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/605
  • disable reflog for CHANGELOG generation by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/606
  • Mostly minor changes on how we display changes. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/607
  • More changes to support Sub-users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/608
  • More changes to support plex external users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/611
  • Mostly a log messages cleanup by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/613
  • Better task log management by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/614

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250118-a9fa743...master-20250215-638a359

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250221-4758e862
entry.content:
• 89c284a minor change on how we display http erros for emby to only display it once by ArabCoders
  • 03db2ff minor updates to how we display data in events view page. by ArabCoders
  • c1c7431 display event logs as actual logs instead of JSON array. by ArabCoders
  • a29a53b made the short ID display for UUID more unique. by ArabCoders
  • 25dfed2 better view of event logs by ArabCoders
  • 90ab9e2 minor task changes by ArabCoders
  • 6926a38 reverted a fix for logs view, which didnt display whitespace correctly by ArabCoders
  • 5845160 standardize on 180secs as minimum to trigger watch progress sync for played items. by ArabCoders
  • ea4c113 Better log display and filtering by ArabCoders
  • 48e5e4d experimental support for syncing watch progress for played items. #617 by ArabCoders
  • 2f287ae Added the ability to remove all events that are not in pending state by ArabCoders
  • cd8a2fd Update log formatter to account for different user@backend format by ArabCoders
  • fdd1cf1 updated testcase to include missing header. by ArabCoders
  • 50ebcb2 Update database maintenance tasks to include sub-users dbs by ArabCoders
  • 90e73bc use jsonl for logs to allow us better control on lines display. by ArabCoders
  • e1a4e50 limit task event log to 200 lines by ArabCoders
  • 8b044bb Log an event when task is run by ArabCoders
  • 7b2d1b1 Added task logs filter by ArabCoders
  • 0102b1c parse some data from logs to make it easier to navigate to effected item by ArabCoders
  • 35e35aa updated mappers to report record if when possible by ArabCoders
  • d4328e0 Made system/reset API endpoint sub-user aware. by ArabCoders

What's Changed

  • Fix release title. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/577
  • re-enable dev builds by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/578
  • fix permissions by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/579
  • make build work on manual dispatch as well by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/580
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/581
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/582
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/583
  • Support per user mapper and database. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/584
  • Implement per user servers.yaml, and support mark as unplayed for all users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/585
  • Free memory after each user sync, and prevent syncing main user by default as it's covered by the regular import/export, and provide flag to enable it. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/586
  • Implements progress sync for all users via state:sync by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/587
  • Fully implemented our vision for Multi-user sync via state:sync command by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/588
  • Added new command to diff two backup files and find the difference by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/590
  • Compress backup files by default and extends lifetime of backups to 90d by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/591
  • Show zip files in backup api and remove the uncompressed file if compressing was done by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/592
  • support backing up mutli-user watch state via state:backup by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/593
  • Major sub users refactor by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/594
  • Merged state:sync functionality into state:import and state:export by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/596
  • Minor frontend improvements by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/597
  • generate changelog json files on tag by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/598
  • more changelog changes by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/599
  • more github workflow updates by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/600
  • more github action changes. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/601
  • fix changelog generator by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/602
  • more workflow changes by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/603
  • Update external packages. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/604
  • update build by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/605
  • disable reflog for CHANGELOG generation by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/606
  • Mostly minor changes on how we display changes. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/607
  • More changes to support Sub-users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/608
  • More changes to support plex external users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/611
  • Mostly a log messages cleanup by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/613
  • Better task log management by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/614
  • Minor WebUI changes by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/616
  • Better events view page by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/618

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250118-a9fa743...master-20250221-4758e862

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250225-708e9a4d
entry.content:
• 1e73822 show 404 for non existing image by ArabCoders
  • cecb604 show poster image for mobile devices and fanart for desktop by ArabCoders
  • 7c9c1ed Added background to item history page by ArabCoders
  • f8a3b5c Made it possible to request show/movie fanart/poster via API by ArabCoders
  • ff07c73 Added support to proxy requests to backends by ArabCoders
  • 6a9db8f added seconds to full log view by ArabCoders
  • 0a7b98d minor changes to some log message to make them more clear by ArabCoders
  • c4d3a7b dependencies update by ArabCoders
  • 7849e6f log item data in parse webhook incase getMetData request failed. by ArabCoders
  • 5fabbf7 Dont double log on getMetadata error by ArabCoders
  • 1f495b3 Fixed watch progress for jellyfin webhooks and enable watch progress for webhooks events by ArabCoders

What's Changed

  • Fix release title. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/577
  • re-enable dev builds by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/578
  • fix permissions by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/579
  • make build work on manual dispatch as well by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/580
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/581
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/582
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/583
  • Support per user mapper and database. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/584
  • Implement per user servers.yaml, and support mark as unplayed for all users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/585
  • Free memory after each user sync, and prevent syncing main user by default as it's covered by the regular import/export, and provide flag to enable it. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/586
  • Implements progress sync for all users via state:sync by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/587
  • Fully implemented our vision for Multi-user sync via state:sync command by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/588
  • Added new command to diff two backup files and find the difference by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/590
  • Compress backup files by default and extends lifetime of backups to 90d by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/591
  • Show zip files in backup api and remove the uncompressed file if compressing was done by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/592
  • support backing up mutli-user watch state via state:backup by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/593
  • Major sub users refactor by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/594
  • Merged state:sync functionality into state:import and state:export by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/596
  • Minor frontend improvements by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/597
  • generate changelog json files on tag by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/598
  • more changelog changes by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/599
  • more github workflow updates by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/600
  • more github action changes. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/601
  • fix changelog generator by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/602
  • more workflow changes by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/603
  • Update external packages. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/604
  • update build by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/605
  • disable reflog for CHANGELOG generation by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/606
  • Mostly minor changes on how we display changes. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/607
  • More changes to support Sub-users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/608
  • More changes to support plex external users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/611
  • Mostly a log messages cleanup by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/613
  • Better task log management by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/614
  • Minor WebUI changes by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/616
  • Better events view page by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/618
  • Add button to display fanart/poster for history items. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/619

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250118-a9fa743...master-20250225-708e9a4d

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250226-60a4a264
entry.content:
• 8a998eb9 re-enforce the backend/user name requirement of being a-z_0-9, due to recent refactor the check was not working as expected we added new tests to cover invalid names. by ArabCoders

What's Changed

  • Fix release title. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/577
  • re-enable dev builds by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/578
  • fix permissions by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/579
  • make build work on manual dispatch as well by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/580
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/581
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/582
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/583
  • Support per user mapper and database. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/584
  • Implement per user servers.yaml, and support mark as unplayed for all users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/585
  • Free memory after each user sync, and prevent syncing main user by default as it's covered by the regular import/export, and provide flag to enable it. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/586
  • Implements progress sync for all users via state:sync by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/587
  • Fully implemented our vision for Multi-user sync via state:sync command by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/588
  • Added new command to diff two backup files and find the difference by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/590
  • Compress backup files by default and extends lifetime of backups to 90d by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/591
  • Show zip files in backup api and remove the uncompressed file if compressing was done by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/592
  • support backing up mutli-user watch state via state:backup by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/593
  • Major sub users refactor by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/594
  • Merged state:sync functionality into state:import and state:export by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/596
  • Minor frontend improvements by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/597
  • generate changelog json files on tag by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/598
  • more changelog changes by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/599
  • more github workflow updates by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/600
  • more github action changes. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/601
  • fix changelog generator by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/602
  • more workflow changes by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/603
  • Update external packages. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/604
  • update build by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/605
  • disable reflog for CHANGELOG generation by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/606
  • Mostly minor changes on how we display changes. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/607
  • More changes to support Sub-users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/608
  • More changes to support plex external users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/611
  • Mostly a log messages cleanup by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/613
  • Better task log management by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/614
  • Minor WebUI changes by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/616
  • Better events view page by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/618
